skillRows.name: EM Haymaker
skillRows.description:
Basic ATK deals 400.0% ATK of Physical DMG.
ATK Interval: 3.3s

skillRows.name: Charge
skillRows.description: ELF's Basic ATKs restore 5.0 bonus SP on hit for itself. CD: 2s.

skillRows.name: Disruptive Punch
skillRows.description: ELF's attacks have a 20.0% chance to deal 150.0% bonus Physical DMG. CD: 10s.

skillRows.name: Smelter Knuckle
skillRows.description: ELF deals 6.0% bonus Total DMG for 10s after landing a hit. 3 stacks max. CD: 1s.

skillRows.name: Power: ULTRA
skillRows.description:
ELF enters burst mode and launches fast attacks in midair for 10s. Each sequence deals 100.0% ATK of Physical DMG. ELF's Crit Rate increases by 12.0% every second (5 stacks max) until burst mode ends. ELF skill button is lit up at max stacks.
CD: 35s
SP: 75

skillRows.name: Super RAD
skillRows.description: The 1st attack in burst mode bleeds enemies for 10.0s, dealing 100% ATK of Physical DMG per second and enabling ELF to Deal 12.0% bonus Total DMG to bleeding enemies within 10.0s.

skillRows.name: Super Critical
skillRows.description: ELF's Ultimate Deals 20.0% bonus Total DMG.

skillRows.name: Harmonic Link
skillRows.description: [Team] Team deals 3.0% bonus Physical DMG and an additional 2.0% bonus Physical DMG if all 3 members are the same type.

skillRows.name: Rapid Harmonics
skillRows.description: [Team] With at least 1 Fast ATK Valkyrie, team deals 4.0% bonus Physical DMG and the last hit of ELF's Ultimate become Heavy ATK with strong trauma charge.

skillRows.name: Super Overdrive
skillRows.description: [Team] With at least 1 Burst Valkyrie, team deals 4.0% bonus Physical DMG and every hit of ELF's Ultimate deals 50.0% ATK of bonus Physical DMG.

skillRows.name: Hard Trauma
skillRows.description: When ELF skill is cast again during burst mode or when burst mode ends, ELF leaps up to deal 1,800.0% x2 ATK of Physical DMG and ELF skill enters cooldown.

skillRows.name: Burst Charge
skillRows.description: Then the last hit of Ultimate crits, ELF restores 1.5 SP per second for 5s.

skillRows.name: Particle Stream
skillRows.description: The last sequence of Ultimate makes enemies take 6.0% bonus Physical DMG for 10s.
